komiyunist pakshayeth nawa sama samaja pakshayeth mahajana pakshayeth deshadrohin puhunu kara sannaddha karana thaththwaya yatatheth indiya adhirajyawadaya wisin owunge jathyanthara chara purusha sewaya haraha lankawa gila ganimata erehiwa pawathina maha badhakaya wi thibena janatha wimukthi peramune nayakayan ghathanaya karawimatath pimbaurupath sakaskara owunge siyaluma lankeya eejanthawarunta niyogakara athi thaththwaya yatatheth ema niyoga yatathe kola koti rajya thrasthawadinuth, yu.an.pi.yath sannaddha hamudawalata wisheshayen aluthin ekathu karagath yu.an.pi. ye deshadrohi kotasuth indiya adhirajyawadaye niyoga pita kriyathmaka wana siyalu denamath genayana jawipe wirodhi sahasika prachanda kriyawala thaththwayan yatatheth ja.wi.pe. palamuwa thama aarakshawa sandahath dewanuwa thama deshaye swadhinathwaya ha akhandathwaya aaraksha kara ganima sandahath, janathawata prajathanthrawadi ayithin yali dina dima sandahath minis ayithin yali labadima sandahath mawubime samaya athi kirima sandahath ape daru munupuru paramparawanata wideshiya aadhipathyayata yatath nowunu niwahal mawubimak uruma kara dima sandahath sannaddha anshayak pihituwima sandaha apata athi ayithiya api nawatha nawathath prakasha kara aththemu.
